Package eu.datacrop.maize.model_repository.services.persistence

Class VendorPersistenceServicesDaoImpl

java.lang.Object
eu.datacrop.maize.model_repository.services.persistence.VendorPersistenceServicesDaoImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
VendorPersistenceServicesDao
@Service public class VendorPersistenceServicesDaoImpl extends Object implements VendorPersistenceServicesDao
This class redirects enquires to the persistence layer pertaining to Vendors.
Since:
version 0.4.0
Author:
Angela-Maria Despotopoulou [Athens, Greece]
